author: palladia
body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/858)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: LGTM but we need an answer from @PowerShell/open on how exactly `-noninteractive` changes the behavior. I don't know if it should just throw or if there's a way to disable cmdlets from even attempting interactivity.

title: Re-write host code command parser engine to support both Linux and Windows style options.  Also, add support for -noninteractive and -encodedcommand.
